pageContext.claim: “The Kentucky Derby decision was not a good one. It was a rough & tumble race on a wet and sloppy track, actually, a beautiful thing to watch. Only in these days of political correctness could such an overturn occur. The best horse did NOT win the Kentucky Derby - not even close!”
pageContext.analysis: It was a rainy race, but video evidence shows the referees made the correct — not just politically accurate — call.
